mods.note: so krch METEOROLOGICAL STATIONS in TRAN and ARABIA. Existing observatories (a) reporting - - - - (b) non-reporting - - - Observatories to be closed down

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on card in colourDimensions: 338 x 213mm

mods.abstract: The map illustrates the locations of meteorological stations in Persia, the Persian Gulf, and along the Arabian Peninsula. It divides these stations into three categories as follows: stations reporting observations, stations not reporting observations, and stations to be closed down.
